summary: An Ordinance ratifying and confirming a loan of Five Hundred Thousand Dollars ($500,000.00) of a loan of Two Million Dollars ($2,000,000.00) authorized at a general election held in The City of Seattle on March 8, 1910, under and in pursuance of Ordinance No. 22732, directing the issuance of bonds therefor; providing a form of such bonds, and providing for the payment of the principal and interest thereof.
